column3:
CALCULATE(
    [Total Stream],
    DATESINPERIOD(
        'Calendar Table'[Date],
        MAX('Calendar Table'[Date]),
        -7,
        DAY
    )
)

SUMX('Streaming Performance Table','Streaming Performance Table'[in_apple_charts]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_apple_playlists]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_deezer_charts]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_deezer_playlists]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_spotify_playlists]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_spotify_charts]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_shazam_charts])
SUMX('Streaming Performance Table','Streaming Performance Table'[in_apple_charts]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_apple_playlists])
SUMX('Streaming Performance Table','Streaming Performance Table'[in_spotify_charts]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_spotify_playlists])
SUMX('Streaming Performance Table','Streaming Performance Table'[in_deezer_charts]+'Streaming Performance Table'[in_deezer_playlists])
